VisualStructure.PrimaryScene: A focused student at a cozy, tidy study desk with textbooks and laptop open, warm natural light filtering through a window, showing concentration during late-night study.
VisualStructure.ProductPlacement: Dynamind IQ soft chew pouch prominently placed on desk near hands reaching for a chew.
VisualStructure.ProductDetail: Close-up of one soft chocolate chew beside the open pouch, texture and richness evident.
VisualStructure.VisualHarmony: Overlay text anchored to desk surface and product pouch, natural warm tones complementing rich chocolate browns.

FooterEndCard.Logo: Chews Health logo in bottom strip

PaletteAndStyle.Accent: Subtle bronze accent on packaging highlights premium feel

REQUIRED_ALWAYS: Must Always include "Available on Amazon" official Amazon tag
Must Always include "Chews Health" official Logo from the references
Must Always include "Dynamind IQ Product image" from the references
